const response = await client.search({
  query: {
    bool: {
      must: {
        match_all: {},
      },
      filter: {
        geo_polygon: {
          "person.location": {
            points: [
              {
                lat: 40,
                lon: -70,
              },
              {
                lat: 30,
                lon: -80,
              },
              {
                lat: 20,
                lon: -90,
              },
            ],
          },
        },
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);
